Description: Ostracon, limestone: Remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text on one side.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group

Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.19)
